   20: -module(bif_no_copt_ssa_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("syntax_tools/include/merl.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0,suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   25: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   26:          unsafe_get_list/1,
   27: 	 beam_validator/1,trunc_and_friends/1,cover_safe_and_pure_bifs/1,
   28:          cover_trim/1,
   29:          head_tail/1,
   30:          min_max/1]).
   31: 
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   34: 
   35: all() ->
   36:     [{group,p}].
   37: 
   38: groups() ->
   39:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   40:       [beam_validator,
   41:        unsafe_get_list,
   42:        trunc_and_friends,
   43:        cover_safe_and_pure_bifs,
   44:        cover_trim,
   45:        head_tail,
   46:        min_max
   47:       ]}].
   48: 
   49: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   50:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: unsafe_get_list(_Config) ->
   63:     [[1], [1], [1]] = create_rows(id(3)),
   64:     ok.
   65: 
   66: create_rows(Num) -> create_rows(Num, [[1]]).
   67: 
   68: create_rows(1, Rows) ->
   69:     Rows;
   70: create_rows(Num, [PrevRow | _] = Rows) ->
   71:     [_PrevRowH | PrevRowT] = PrevRow,
   72:     [] = first(PrevRowT, PrevRow),
   73:     create_rows(Num - 1, [[1] | Rows]).
   74: 
   75: first(Fst, _Snd) -> Fst.
   76: 
   77: %% Cover code in beam_validator.
   78: 
   79: beam_validator(Config) ->
   80:     [false,Config] = food(Config),
   81: 
   82:     true = is_number(42.0),
   83:     false = is_port(Config),
   84: 
   85:     ok.
   86: 
   87: food(Curriculum) ->
   88:     [try
   89: 	 is_bitstring(functions)
   90:      catch _ ->
   91: 	     0
   92:      end, Curriculum].
   93: 
   94: %% Test trunc/1, round/1, floor/1, ceil/1.
   95: trunc_and_friends(_Config) ->
   96:     Bifs = [trunc,round,floor,ceil],
   97:     Fs = trunc_and_friends_1(Bifs),
   98:     Mod = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
   99:     Calls = [begin
  100: 		 Atom = erl_syntax:function_name(N),
  101: 		 ?Q("'@Atom'()")
  102: 	     end || N <- Fs],
  103:     Tree = ?Q(["-module('@Mod@').",
  104: 	       "-export([test/0]).",
  105: 	       "test() -> _@Calls, ok.",
  106: 	       "id(I) -> I."]) ++ Fs,
  107:     merl:print(Tree),
  108:     Opts = test_lib:opt_opts(?MODULE),
  109:     {ok,_Bin} = merl:compile_and_load(Tree, Opts),
  110:     Mod:test(),
  111:     ok.
  112: 
  113: trunc_and_friends_1([F|Fs]) ->
  114:     Func = list_to_atom("f"++integer_to_list(length(Fs))),
  115:     [trunc_template(Func, F)|trunc_and_friends_1(Fs)];
  116: trunc_and_friends_1([]) -> [].
  117: 
  118: trunc_template(Func, Bif) ->
  119:     Val = 42.77,
  120:     Res = erlang:Bif(Val),
  121:     FloatRes = float(Res),
  122:     ?Q("'@Func@'() ->
  123:         Var = id(_@Val@),
  124:         if _@Bif@(Var) =:= _@Res@ -> ok end,
  125: 	if _@Bif@(Var) == _@FloatRes@ -> ok end,
  126: 	if _@Bif@(Var) == _@Res@ -> ok end,
  127:         _@Res@ = _@Bif@(Var),
  128:         try begin _@Bif@(a), ok end
  129:         catch error:badarg -> ok end,
  130:         ok.").
  131: 
  132: cover_safe_and_pure_bifs(Config) ->
  133:     _ = get(),
  134:     _ = get_keys(a),
  135:     _ = group_leader(),
  136:     _ = is_alive(),
  137:     _ = min(Config, []),
  138:     _ = nodes(),
  139:     _ = erlang:ports(),
  140:     _ = pre_loaded(),
  141:     _ = processes(),
  142:     _ = registered(),
  143:     _ = term_to_binary(Config),
  144:     42 = list_to_integer("2A", 16),
  145:     a = binary_to_atom(atom_to_binary(a)),
  146: 
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: cover_trim(_Config) ->
  150:     ok = cover_trim_1(<<"abc">>, id([42])),
  151:     ok = cover_trim_1({a,b,c}, id([42])),
  152: 
  153:     true = cover_trim_2("keep-alive", "1"),
  154:     false = cover_trim_2("keep-alive", "0"),
  155:     false = cover_trim_2("other", "1"),
  156:     false = cover_trim_2("other", "0"),
  157: 
  158:     true = cover_trim_3("keep-alive", -1),
  159:     false = cover_trim_3("keep-alive", 100),
  160:     false = cover_trim_3("other", -10),
  161:     false = cover_trim_3("other", -100),
  162: 
  163:     ok.
  164: 
  165: cover_trim_1(Something, V) ->
  166:     id(Something),
  167:     id(Something),
  168:     if
  169:         hd(V) =:= 42 ->
  170:             ok
  171:     end.
  172: 
  173: cover_trim_2(Header, NList)->
  174:     id(0),
  175:     case id(Header) of
  176:         "keep-alive" when hd(NList) >= $1 ->
  177:             true;
  178:         _Connect ->
  179:             false
  180:     end.
  181: 
  182: cover_trim_3(Header, N)->
  183:     id(0),
  184:     case id(Header) of
  185:         "keep-alive" when abs(N) < 42 ->
  186:             true;
  187:         _Connect ->
  188:             false
  189:     end.
  190: 
  191: %% GH-7024: The loader transformations for hd/1 and tl/1 were incorrect and
  192: %% failed when certain optimizations were turned off.
  193: head_tail(_Config) ->
  194:     {1, ok} = head_case(),
  195:     {1, ok} = tail_case(),
  196: 
  197:     1 = hd(id([1])),
  198:     [] = tl(id([1])),
  199: 
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: head_case() ->
  203:     case 1 of
  204:         X when hd(X) -> blurf;
  205:         X -> {X, ok}
  206:     end.
  207: 
  208: tail_case() ->
  209:     case 1 of
  210:         X when tl(X) -> blurf;
  211:         X -> {X, ok}
  212:     end.
  213: 
  214: min_max(_Config) ->
  215:     False = id(false),
  216:     True = id(true),
  217: 
  218:     false = bool_min_false(False, False),
  219:     false = bool_min_false(False, True),
  220:     false = bool_min_false(True, False),
  221:     true = bool_min_true(True, True),
  222: 
  223:     false = bool_max_false(False, False),
  224:     true = bool_max_true(False, True),
  225:     true = bool_max_true(True, False),
  226:     true = bool_max_true(True, True),
  227: 
  228:     ok.
  229: 
  230: %% GH-7170: The following functions would cause a crash in
  231: %% beam_ssa_codegen.
  232: 
  233: bool_min_false(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  234:     false = min(A, B).
  235: 
  236: bool_min_true(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  237:     true = min(A, B).
  238: 
  239: bool_max_false(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  240:     false = max(A, B).
  241: 
  242: bool_max_true(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  243:     true = max(A, B).
  244: 
  245: %%%
  246: %%% Common utilities.
  247: %%%
  248: 
  249: id(I) ->
  250:     I.
